Package main

Class Musial

java.lang.Object
main.Musial
public final class Musial
extends java.lang.Object
Main class of MUSIAL (MUlti Sample varIant AnaLysis), a tool to calculate SNV, gene, and whole genome alignments, together with other relevant statistics based on vcf files.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Alexander Seitz, Simon Hackl

    • main

      Conducts the main pipeline of the tool (see comments and single methods for more detail).
      Parameters:
      args - Arguments parsed from the command line.

    • loadMetadata

      private static void loadMetadata()
      Loads metadata, such as the projects title and version from resources and prints the information to stdout.

    • parseCLArguments

      private static ArgumentsParser parseCLArguments​(java.lang.String[] args) throws MusialCLAException, MusialIOException, org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException, MusialBioException
      Parses command line arguments by instantiating a ArgumentsParser object.

      The command line arguments specified by the user and accepted by the `main` method are passed and used to instantiate an ArgumentsParser object which is returned if all argument validation steps were successful. If any error arises during the parsing step the program exits.

      Parameters:
      args - Arguments parsed from the command line.
      Returns:
      An instance of the ArgumentsParser class.
      Throws:
      MusialCLAException
      MusialIOException
      org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
      MusialBioException

    • runSnpEff

      private static void runSnpEff​(ArgumentsParser arguments) throws MusialIOException, java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Runs SnpEff (additional annotation of .vcf files)

      The command line arguments specified by the user and accepted by the `main` method are passed to the static method of the SnpEffAnnotator class. The method does not return any value, but all annotated .vcf files generated with SnpEff will be stored in the directory [output]/snpEff/results. If any errors arise during the process the program exits.

      Parameters:
      arguments - Arguments parsed from the command line.
      Throws:
      MusialIOException
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • preprocessReferenceInput

      private static java.util.HashSet<FeatureAnalysisEntry> preprocessReferenceInput​(ArgumentsParser arguments) throws java.io.IOException, MusialBioException
      Parses the specified reference data and generates a set of analysis entries.

      Each FeatureAnalysisEntry represents a genomic region of the reference data, for example a single gene, contig, plasmid or full genome. Each such entry contains naming as well as reference sequence information.

      Parameters:
      arguments - Arguments parsed from the command line.
      Returns:
      A HashSet containing FeatureAnalysisEntry instances specifying genomic regions of the specified reference data that are subject to further analysis.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      MusialBioException

    • preprocessSampleInput

      private static java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArraySet<SampleAnalysisEntry> preprocessSampleInput​(ArgumentsParser arguments) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Analyzes the specified sample data and generates a set of analysis entries.

      Each SampleAnalysisEntry represents a sample name and a VCFFileReader instance pointing to the specified input `.vcf` file of the sample.

      Parameters:
      arguments - Arguments parsed from the command line.
      Returns:
      A CopyOnWriteArraySet containing SampleAnalysisEntry instances, each specifying the input for one sample to analyze.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • invokeSampleAnalyserRunner

      private static VariantPositionsTable invokeSampleAnalyserRunner​(java.util.HashSet<FeatureAnalysisEntry> analysisEntries, java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArraySet<SampleAnalysisEntry> sampleAnalysisEntries, ArgumentsParser arguments) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Invokes multi-threaded analysis of the input samples.

      The single steps are implemented in the SampleAnalyser and SampleAnalyserRunnable classes.

      Parameters:
      analysisEntries - A set of FeatureAnalysisEntry.
      sampleAnalysisEntries - A set of SampleAnalysisEntry.
      arguments - Arguments parsed from the command line.
      Returns:
      A VariantPositionsTable containing the information processed from the specified input.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • writeOutput

      private static void writeOutput​(ArgumentsParser arguments, VariantPositionsTable variantPositionsTable, java.util.HashSet<FeatureAnalysisEntry> featureAnalysisEntries) throws MusialIOException, MusialBioException
      Generate output files.

      The single steps are implemented in the OutputWriter and IO classes.

      Parameters:
      arguments - Arguments parsed from the command line.
      variantPositionsTable - The VariantPositionsTable containing the information to write output with.
      featureAnalysisEntries - represents a genomic region of the reference data, for example a single gene, contig, plasmid or full genome. Each such entry contains naming as well as reference sequence information.
      Throws:
      MusialIOException
      MusialBioException

    • buildProgress

      public static me.tongfei.progressbar.ProgressBar buildProgress()
      Generates and returns ProgressBar instance.
      Returns:
      Instance of ProgressBar with the options specified by the progressBarBuilder property.
